comments.text: Started error message audit. Collected Python error message sources (cli, issue_*, migration, daemon_*). Initial Rust scan shows matching strings in issue_creation, migration, daemon_client, daemon_protocol, etc. Next: side-by-side compare messages used in Gherkin steps vs implementation, identify mismatches, update specs or code to align.

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Completed initial error message audit against active Gherkin scenarios. Verified key strings align across Python and Rust for: not a git repository, already initialized, title is required, unknown issue type, invalid priority, not found, invalid transition, invalid parent-child, and migration errors. WIP configuration unknown-fields scenario still not enforced (implementation currently relies on YAML/serde validation). No code changes required for active specs.
